data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Paretas-Martínez, Jordi, Rakhsani, Ehsan, Fathabadi, Khalil, Pujade-Villar, Juli (2012): sp. n. (Hymenoptera: Cynipoidea: Figitidae: Figitinae) from Iran, with a key to the genera of Figitinae. Zootaxa 3177: 43-51, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210723
